name: Xenorift
description:
Xenorift is a side scrolling shoot'em up where your ship has the ability to change his shoot direction, thus changing his dimension ! You can avoid the asteroids by switching dimension, and making them tangible/intagible.

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2022, which theme was "duality".

Controls are adapted to keyboard and Xbox controller ! 

  • Arrows or the Joystick for movements
  • E or Joystick B button to switch dimension
  • Hold Space or Joystick A button to shoot

Made by team Poivronruj :

  • Antoine Nisoli - Programmer
  • Nicolas Revillon - Game Art
  • Antoine Cuvilliez - Game Art
  • Pierre Morreel - Game Art & VFX
  • Flavie Basile - Concept Art & Key Art 
  • Logan Berdah - Music composer (Soundcloud)
  • François Surma - Sound Design (Soundcloud)
